list_definition.definition: a thick cloud of moisture or water vapour/vapor in the air which makes it difficult to see

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I had to drive very slowly because of the fog.

list_definition.mean_english: bao phủ hay bị bao phủ bằng sương mù
list_definition.definition: (usually with up) to cover with fog

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Her glasses were fogged up with steam.
